item.description:
NetSAP Boston presents an evening of networking, dinner and a talk on Ayurveda.

Ayurveda is an ancient Indian medical system based on holistic wellness and treatments. The talk will touch on Ayurveda's origins, major concepts and applications.

Our guest speaker will be Dr. Pratibha Shah, MD Ayurved, BAMS. Dr. Shah has been practicing Ayurvedic medicine for over 20 years and lectures frequently on Ayurveda. She has a bachelors & masters in Ayurveda and is currently pursuing a Masters in Public Health from Boston University.

Schedule:
6:30 – 7PM – Networking & Dinner
7 – 8PM – Lecture on Ayurveda by Dr. Shah
8 – 8:30PM – Q & A Session

Pizza will be served. All are welcome - no charge!

Tuesday, April 24 2012, 6:30pm - 9:00pm

Brookline Public Library
31 Pleasant Street, Brookline MA 02446
(near Coolidge Corner T stop)
item.name: Ayurveda Talk
